item.title: Digi increases LTE coverage in the Klang Valley, Malaysia
item.description:
Source: Digi. In this image, Digi’s CEO, Albern Murty (left), demonstrates the high quality and reliability of their 4G LTE network through a video call. The call connects with Hitz.FM radio personalities Ean and Adam C, visible on the smaller screen to the left. Loh Keh Jiat, Digi’s Chief Sales Officer, stands on the right. Digi Telecommunications has significantly broadened its LTE network coverage in the Klang Valley, more than doubling its reach in this region...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/digi-increases-lte-coverage-in-the-klang-valley-malaysia/

item.title: W Retreat & Spa Bali - Seminyak is celebrating its fifth anniversary with a month-long celebration
item.description:
Source: W Retreat & Spa Bali website. The W Retreat & Spa Bali in Seminyak is celebrating its fifth anniversary on March 5, 2016. The resort will commemorate this milestone with a month-long celebration titled “FIVE ON FIVE,” showcasing five unique highlights. WOOBAR will present special edition Paletas Wey popsicles, a Mexican-style frozen treat crafted by the Bali-based company. Meanwhile, W THE STORE will offer an exclusive, limited-edition collection of “Wanitas” décor...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/w-retreat-spa-bali-seminyak-is-celebrating-its-fifth-anniversary-with-a-month-long-celebration/

item.title: Digi introduces 4G LTE service in Johor Bahru, Malaysia
item.description:
Source: Digi. Pictured at the launch of Digi’s 4G LTE service in Johor Bahru are (from left): Tuan Haji Rizal B. Abd Malek, Regional Head of the Malaysian Communications and Multimedia Commission (SKMM) Southern Region; Loh Keh Jiat, Digi’s Chief Sales Officer; YB Datuk Ir Haji Hasni B Haji Mohammad, Chairman of the Johor Executive Council for Public Works, Rural and Regional Development; Digi’s Chief Network Officer Kesavan Sivabalan; and Ng Chak Khin, Digi’s Head of Southern Region...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/digi-introduces-4g-lte-service-in-johor-bahru-malaysia/

item.title: In May 2015, Digi prepaid customers have the chance to win smartphones, tablets, and cars
item.description:
Source: Digi. Thrane. Digi Telecommunication (Digi) is celebrating its 20th anniversary by giving back to its prepaid customers. Throughout May, Digi will be offering prizes like smartphones, tablets, and even cars. From May 1st to May 31st, customers who top-up their prepaid credit are eligible to win prizes. Every day, 20 smartphones will be given away, with 200 tablets awarded weekly. Two lucky winners will even drive home a Ford Ranger...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/in-may-2015-digi-prepaid-customers-have-the-chance-to-win-smartphones-tablets-and-cars/

item.title: Celebrate the successful first year of Hyatt Regency Suzhou with our Anniversary Meeting Package
item.description:
Source: Hyatt Regency Suzhou. The Hyatt Regency Suzhou is commemorating its first anniversary with various special offers as a thank you to its loyal and valued guests for their support throughout the year. Having opened its doors on August 24, 2014, in the Suzhou Industrial Park (SIP), the conveniently located Hyatt Regency Suzhou boasts 355 rooms and suites. Amenities include a Regency Club, five dining options, and over 15,000 square feet of space for events...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/celebrate-the-successful-first-year-of-hyatt-regency-suzhou-with-our-anniversary-meeting-package/

item.title: 15 beauty tips for 2015 to celebrate the 15th anniversary of Giorgio Armani Beauty
item.description:
Source: L’Oreal. Giorgio Armani Beauty is commemorating the 15th anniversary of its makeup line with a series of 15 instructional videos. Released periodically throughout the year, these short clips will feature Linda Cantello, Giorgio Armani’s International Make-Up Artist, sharing simple makeup techniques and expert advice. While the professional tips are specifically tailored for Armani products, the company asserts that anyone can easily understand and implement them. Curious? Check out the videos:..
